dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Violations and Piracy by stas.visit-to.us(67.18.205.82)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2005 12:54 PM
To: Dennis Meyers
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Violations and Piracy by
stas.visit-to.us(67.18.205.82)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Dennis Meyers wrote:
| Dear Sirs,
|
| The web site that you host, stas.visit-to.us(67.18.205.82) is selling
| pirated, copyrighted software on their site at.
|
| http://stas.visit-to.us  and http://stas.visit-to.us/omega.htm
|
| You are in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act for
| allowing a company that you host to sell unauthorized copyrighted
software.
|
| With this notice you are thus informed of this massive copyright
| violation by your client and if this violation does not cease forthwith
| you will also be subject and held liable for legal action.
|
| We demand that you immediately remove this web site. Cease and desist
| from hosting the above noted web site that is selling pirated and
| copyrighted software products so that we do not have to take legal
| action against you.
|
| Thank you for your attention to this matter.
|
|
| Dennis Meyers
|
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB6BVavK/XpJs6oyURAiuoAJ4hXIUYNaYF9XJxa7SdhToVKmJ9PwCfYxbF
WCs+U2j6SB4SmVh3RoufvnM=
=zPRq
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
